Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.client.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    Is responsible for handling the incoming Messages
    Author:
    Wanja Sajko, Christoph Hermann, Yize Sun

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientController

        public ClientController(ClientConnection client,
                        ChatController chatController,
                        Lobby lobby,
                        ApplicationController applicationController)
        Creates a new ClientController.
        Parameters:
        client - the ClientConnection this controller uses to send messages to the Server.
        chatController - the controller responsible for displaying chat messages received by this client.
        lobby - the Lobby used by this controller.
        applicationController - the controller responsible of managing the different scenes of this application.

      • ClientController

        public ClientController(ClientConnection client,
                        Lobby lobby)
        Creates a new ClientController.
        Parameters:
        client - the ClientConnection this controller uses to send messages to the Server.
        lobby - the Lobby used by this controller.
